vote.title: Authorize a second amendment to the existing design and construction agreement with the Friends of the Katy Trail, Inc. for the extension of the soft surface trail on a portion of the Katy Trail located between Blackburn Street and Armstrong Avenue and for resurfacing of the existing soft surface trail to include additional 2017 Bond Funds -Not to exceed $99,000.00, from $1,000,000.00 to $1,099,000.00 - Financing: Park and Recreation Facilities (B) Fund (2017 General Obligation Bond Fund)
vote.description: Authorize a second amendment to the existing design and construction agreement with the Friends of the Katy Trail, Inc. for the extension of the soft surface trail on a portion of the Katy Trail located between Blackburn Street and Armstrong Avenue and for resurfacing of the existing soft surface trail to include additional 2017 Bond Funds -Not to exceed $99,000.00, from $1,000,000.00 to $1,099,000.00 - Financing: Park and Recreation Facilities (B) Fund (2017 General Obligation Bond Fund)
